vendor_name.reason: Top-left prominent text under the document title; typical vendor/company header placement and font size ('Craigs' Landscaping'). Visual header cluster indicates supplier name.

vendor_address.reason: Multi-line block beneath vendor name in the top-left header area contains street and city/state/ZIP; formatted into a single-line normalized postal address.

vendor_phone.reason: Phone-like numeric sequence appears in the top-right of the vendor contact block ('123-456-7890'); preserved formatting with dashes as shown.

vendor_email.reason: Email-pattern string visible in vendor contact block at top-right; normalized to lowercase.

vendor_website.reason: Domain-like text shown below the email in the vendor contact area; interpreted as website.

customer_name.reason: Under the 'Bill To' heading (left pale-blue block) the first line is the billed party name 'Smith Enterprises' â€” standard bill-to placement.

customer_address.reason: Multi-line block under the 'Bill To' heading contains the recipient's street and city/state/ZIP; normalized to single-line postal format.

invoice_number.reason: Label 'Invoice #' in the Invoice Details block (right pale-blue area) with value '12345' adjacent to it; clear invoice identifier.

invoice_date.reason: Label 'Invoice date' in the invoice details block shows '08/01/2024'; normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

due_date.reason: Label 'Due date' in the invoice details block shows '08/31/2024'; normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

terms.reason: Label 'Terms' in the invoice details block reads 'Net 30'; common payment terms wording preserved.

line_items.reason: Tabular area under 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount' contains two rows. Each row mapped to description, quantity, rate (unit_price) and amount (line_total). Currency '$' inferred from rate/amount columns.

line_item_description.reason: Multiple item descriptions exist in the table; individual singular 'line_item_description' not populated because the document contains an array of descriptions (see 'line_items' array).

line_item_quantity.reason: Multiple quantities present in the table (3.4 and 3). Quantities are provided in the 'line_items' array; leaving this singular field null to avoid inventing which row to assign.

line_item_unit_price.reason: Multiple unit prices present in the table ($125 and $75); values provided in the 'line_items' array instead of a single-field value.

line_item_total.reason: Multiple line totals present in the table ($425 and $225); these are listed in the 'line_items' array rather than a single-field mapping.

pay_to.reason: No explicit 'Pay To' or bank remittance block is present in this document image; only vendor contact info is shown. Payment destination details not provided.

bank_account_name.reason: No bank account name or account-holder fields visible on this invoice.

bank_account_number.reason: No bank account number or account reference present in the visible invoice.

subtotal.reason: Right-aligned 'Subtotal' line in totals area shows '$650.00'; normalized to numeric value without currency symbol.

discount.reason: Line labeled 'Discount' shows '-$65.00' in totals block; normalized to numeric negative value indicating subtraction.

tax_rate.reason: Totals area line reads 'Tax 8.5%' with an adjacent monetary value; tax percentage extracted and normalized to numeric percent (8.5).

tax_amount.reason: Monetary value next to the 'Tax 8.5%' label shows '$49.73'; normalized to numeric amount.

total.reason: Prominent 'Total' line in the totals block shows '$634.73' (bolded) as the final amount due; normalized to numeric value.

currency.reason: Monetary values use the dollar sign ('$') throughout the document. Normalized currency code set to 'USD' based on '$' symbol and US address context (Palo Alto, CA).

document_title.reason: Large top-left title reads 'Invoice' indicating document type.

notes.reason: No additional free-form notes, payment instructions or small-print text detected in the visible areas below the table or near totals.

layout_region.value: header: top-left/right vendor contacts; bill-to: left pale-blue block; invoice-details: right pale-blue block; items: center table; totals: bottom-right
layout_region.reason: Document has clear visual regions: vendor header at top-left and top-right contact details, a pale-blue band with 'Bill To' (left) and 'Invoice Details' (right), line-item table centered, totals at bottom-right. Provided as a textual region map to assist bounding-box mapping.
